CustomField.formula: (YEAR(EndDate) - YEAR(ServiceDate)) * 12 + (MONTH(EndDate) - MONTH(ServiceDate)) + ( (DAY(EndDate) / CASE(MONTH(EndDate), 1,31, 2, IF(MOD(YEAR(EndDate),4)=0,29,28), 3,31, 4,30, 5,31, 6,30, 7,31, 8,31, 9,30, 10,31, 11,30, 12,31, 0) ) - ((DAY(ServiceDate) - 1) / CASE(MONTH(ServiceDate), 1,31, 2, IF(MOD(YEAR(ServiceDate),4)=0,29,28), 3,31, 4,30, 5,31, 6,30, 7,31, 8,31, 9,30, 10,31, 11,30, 12,31, 0) ) )
CustomField.label: Period In Months
